Html:
Hi folks

I tried to use the Graph# like shown in the tutorial video (http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VTbuvkaPGxE&feature=related) but when I try to build my project I get an "Assembly generation failed" error since the referenced assembly has no strong name.

I'm new to .NET and WPF, so could maybe anybody help me with this issue?

 

Thanks in advance!
I figured this one out. Either you sign the assemblies yourself (i.e. give it a strong name) using the provided source code or you unsign your own project.
